title: 258: You're Not Crazy—You're Awakening with Amber Valdez
itunes:title: 258: You're Not Crazy—You're Awakening with Amber Valdez
description:
The awakening process ain’t easy! In this episode, light worker Amber shares with us the signs of an awakening, the importance of saying yes to your calling and the need to get support along the way. If you feel like your life is being thrown upside down and you’re ready to alchemize your awakening and turn your crazy into your calling.. This episode is for you.

Sahara no longer facilitates this mastermind but instead created the Dharma Coaching Institute to train people to become Certified Dharma Coaches. Find out more at iamsahararose.com

Amber will be an expert guest in Rose Gold Goddesses. Join the community that supports you on your spiritual journey, Rose Gold Goddesses. We are the sacred sisterhood collective honoring the goddess within, with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Get 20% off your Anima Mundi Herbals at animamundiherbals.com with coupon code "sahara"

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

No other use, including, without limitation, reproduction, retransmission or editing, of this Podcast may be made without the prior written permission of the Sahara Rose, which may be requested by contacting pr@iamsahararose.com.

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
